newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Cognizant Corp started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Cognizant Corp started.

text.p: -- Deutsche Morgan Grenfell analyst Peter Barry said he initiated coverage of Cognizant Corp with a buy rating and a 12-month target price of $52.

-- "(Cognizant) shares have significant appreciation potential over the next several years, driven both by profit growth, that we gauge at better than 20 percent annually, and valuation expansion as investor confidence in the company's individual growth characteristics and earnings delivery capability solidify," Barry said in a research note.
